description.zh: 國內半導體資訊、自動化、化學、精密工業等與日本關係非常密切。日本為世界第二大經濟大國，日文方面科技資料甚多，如能培養學生閱讀科技日文資料，對國內未來科技與工業之發展有莫大助益。本課程內容在於如何收集與閱讀日文方面科技資料，學習時分兩段，基礎篇與應用篇。
description.en: This course has been designed to provide students essential Japanese language ability for reading technical information. The course covers: (1)Basic Japanese grammar (2)Japanese technical phrase(3)Technical terminology: semiconductor, information technology, automation, biotechnolpgy, and polymer chemistry.

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1.論文閱讀練習    2.翻訣技巧    3.技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 建立設計專業用日文基礎；日文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業日文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關日文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of Japanese to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based Japanese.
